channel.title: Store custom account data
channel.description: I want to store some custom account data with each user. Is there an easy way to do this, like is there a json field somewhere that I can use to store and retrieve this data?

item.title: Store custom account data
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Not without some significant hacking on the source code. What kind of data are you looking to store?

Read full topic
